items.title: Nifty stuck in tight range as smallcaps slide up to 42%
items.description: Foreign Institutional Investors (FIIs) continued their selling on sixth consecutive month as they sold equities worth Rs 21,231.25 crore in the month of March till now.

items.title: Remove uncertainty, trade pure outperformance with long-shorts: Shubham Agarwal
Market ends lower in rangebound week amid mixed cues
items.description: During the week, the Indian rupee ended lower by 12 paise at 87 per dollar on March 13 against the March 7 closing of 86.88.

items.title: Wall Street ends sharply higher as selloff prompts dip-buying rally
items.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 674.62 points, or 1.65%, to 41,488.19. The S&P 500 advanced 117.42 points, or 2.13%, to 5,638.94 and the Nasdaq Composite gained 451.07 points, or 2.61%, at 17,754.09.

items.title: Market likely to be directionless but experts bet on these 8 stocks for next week
items.description: Despite likely consolidation in the market, experts advised buying 8 stocks for the next week.
